body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service team. My name is Jeffrey Nelson and I represent Hotel Paradise.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I kindly ask for your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Frances Garcia.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Frances. To assist you better, could you please provide me with your room number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My room number is three zero two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Frances. Additionally, could you please confirm your check-in date with us, for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My check-in date was the twenty-fifth of March.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Frances. I will review your case regarding the food quality issue you mentioned.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you again for bringing this to our attention, Frances. We will take the necessary steps to address your concerns. Have a great day!
